question: For each active mailing list, list the owner, the name and phone number of the department that contributes the largest number of students to the list, and the total number of students subscribed to the mailing list from that department.
sql:
WITH StudentMemberCounts AS (
    SELECT
        mld.MOIRA_LIST_KEY,
        ml.MOIRA_LIST_NAME,
        mo.OWNER AS list_owner,
        ml.IS_PUBLIC AS visibility, 
        ad.DEPARTMENT_PHONE_NUMBER AS department_phone,
        ad.SIS_ADMIN_DEPARTMENT_NAME AS department_name,
        COUNT(DISTINCT msd.FULL_NAME) AS student_members  
    FROM MOIRA_LIST_DETAIL mld
    JOIN MOIRA_LIST ml ON mld.MOIRA_LIST_KEY = ml.MOIRA_LIST_KEY
    JOIN MOIRA_LIST_OWNER mo ON mld.MOIRA_LIST_OWNER_KEY = mo.MOIRA_LIST_OWNER_KEY
    JOIN WAREUSER.SE_PERSON se ON upper(mld.MOIRA_LIST_MEMBER) = se.KRB_NAME  
    JOIN MIT_STUDENT_DIRECTORY msd ON se.FULL_NAME = msd.FULL_NAME 
    LEFT JOIN SIS_ADMIN_DEPARTMENT ad ON msd.DEPARTMENT = ad.SIS_ADMIN_DEPARTMENT_CODE
    WHERE ml.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND ml.IS_MOIRA_MAILING_LIST = 'Y'
    GROUP BY mld.MOIRA_LIST_KEY, ml.MOIRA_LIST_NAME, mo.OWNER, ml.IS_PUBLIC, 
             ad.DEPARTMENT_PHONE_AREA_CODE, ad.DEPARTMENT_PHONE_NUMBER, ad.SIS_ADMIN_DEPARTMENT_NAME
),
RankedDepartments AS (
    SELECT
        list_owner,
        department_name,
        department_phone,
        SUM(student_members) AS total_student_members,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY list_owner ORDER BY SUM(student_members) DESC) AS department_rank
    FROM StudentMemberCounts
    GROUP BY list_owner, department_name, department_phone
)
SELECT
    list_owner,
    department_name AS most_prominent_dpt,
    department_phone AS most_prominent_dpt_phone,
    total_student_members
FROM RankedDepartments
WHERE department_rank = 1  
ORDER BY list_owner;
qualified:
WITH "studentmembercounts" AS (
  SELECT
    moira_list_detail."moira_list_key" AS "moira_list_key",
    moira_list."moira_list_name" AS "moira_list_name",
    moira_list_owner."owner" AS "list_owner",
    moira_list."is_public" AS "visibility",
    sis_admin_department."department_phone_number" AS "department_phone",
    sis_admin_department."sis_admin_department_name" AS "department_name",
    COUNT(DISTINCT mit_student_directory."full_name") AS "student_members"
  FROM "moira_list_detail" AS "mld"
  JOIN "moira_list" AS "ml"
    ON moira_list_detail."moira_list_key" = moira_list."moira_list_key"
  JOIN "moira_list_owner" AS "mo"
    ON moira_list_detail."moira_list_owner_key" = moira_list_owner."moira_list_owner_key"
  JOIN "wareuser"."se_person" AS "se"
    ON UPPER(moira_list_detail."moira_list_member") = se_person."krb_name"
  JOIN "mit_student_directory" AS "msd"
    ON se_person."full_name" = mit_student_directory."full_name"
  LEFT JOIN "sis_admin_department" AS "ad"
    ON mit_student_directory."department" = sis_admin_department."sis_admin_department_code"
  WHERE
    moira_list."is_active" = 'Y' AND moira_list."is_moira_mailing_list" = 'Y'
  GROUP BY
    moira_list_detail."moira_list_key",
    moira_list."moira_list_name",
    moira_list_owner."owner",
    moira_list."is_public",
    sis_admin_department."department_phone_area_code",
    sis_admin_department."department_phone_number",
    sis_admin_department."sis_admin_department_name"
), "rankeddepartments" AS (
  SELECT
    "studentmembercounts"."list_owner" AS "list_owner",
    "studentmembercounts"."department_name" AS "department_name",
    "studentmembercounts"."department_phone" AS "department_phone",
    SUM("studentmembercounts"."student_members") AS "total_student_members",
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY "studentmembercounts"."list_owner" ORDER BY SUM("studentmembercounts"."student_members") DESC) AS "department_rank"
  FROM "studentmembercounts" AS "studentmembercounts"
  GROUP BY
    "studentmembercounts"."list_owner",
    "studentmembercounts"."department_name",
    "studentmembercounts"."department_phone"
)
SELECT
  "rankeddepartments"."list_owner" AS "list_owner",
  "rankeddepartments"."department_name" AS "most_prominent_dpt",
  "rankeddepartments"."department_phone" AS "most_prominent_dpt_phone",
  "rankeddepartments"."total_student_members" AS "total_student_members"
FROM "rankeddepartments" AS "rankeddepartments"
WHERE
  "rankeddepartments"."department_rank" = 1
ORDER BY
  "list_owner"

question: For each mailing list, list its owner, owner type, the member visibility ('Public Members' if public, and 'Hidden Members' otherwise), and the number of members of this type of visibility. For each owner and owner type, include a grand total for all members in the format of (owner, owner type, null, total members).
sql:
WITH MemberVisibility AS (
    SELECT
        mo.OWNER,
        mo.OWNER_TYPE,
        CASE 
            WHEN ml.IS_PUBLIC = 'Y' THEN 'Public Members' 
            WHEN ml.IS_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN 'Hidden Members' 
            ELSE NULL 
        END AS member_visibility,
        COUNT(DISTINCT mld.MOIRA_LIST_MEMBER) AS total_members 
    FROM MOIRA_LIST_DETAIL mld
    JOIN MOIRA_LIST ml ON mld.MOIRA_LIST_KEY = ml.MOIRA_LIST_KEY
    JOIN MOIRA_LIST_OWNER mo ON mld.MOIRA_LIST_OWNER_KEY = mo.MOIRA_LIST_OWNER_KEY
    WHERE ml.IS_MOIRA_GROUP = 'Y'
    GROUP BY mo.OWNER, mo.OWNER_TYPE, ml.IS_PUBLIC
),
RollupResults AS (
    SELECT
        OWNER,
        member_visibility,
        SUM(total_members) AS total_members
    FROM MemberVisibility
    GROUP BY ROLLUP(OWNER, member_visibility)
    HAVING SUM(total_members) > 0 
)
SELECT
    rr.OWNER,
    mv.OWNER_TYPE, -- Join to get OWNER_TYPE
    rr.member_visibility,
    rr.total_members
FROM RollupResults rr
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT OWNER, OWNER_TYPE FROM MemberVisibility
) mv ON rr.OWNER = mv.OWNER
ORDER BY rr.OWNER, rr.member_visibility;
qualified:
WITH "membervisibility" AS (
  SELECT
    moira_list_owner."owner" AS "owner",
    moira_list_owner."owner_type" AS "owner_type",
    CASE
      WHEN moira_list."is_public" = 'Y'
      THEN 'Public Members'
      WHEN moira_list."is_public" = 'N'
      THEN 'Hidden Members'
      ELSE NULL
    END AS "member_visibility",
    COUNT(DISTINCT moira_list_detail."moira_list_member") AS "total_members"
  FROM "moira_list_detail" AS "mld"
  JOIN "moira_list" AS "ml"
    ON moira_list_detail."moira_list_key" = moira_list."moira_list_key"
  JOIN "moira_list_owner" AS "mo"
    ON moira_list_detail."moira_list_owner_key" = moira_list_owner."moira_list_owner_key"
  WHERE
    moira_list."is_moira_group" = 'Y'
  GROUP BY
    moira_list_owner."owner",
    moira_list_owner."owner_type",
    moira_list."is_public"
), "rollupresults" AS (
  SELECT
    "membervisibility"."owner" AS "owner",
    "membervisibility"."member_visibility" AS "member_visibility",
    SUM("membervisibility"."total_members") AS "total_members"
  FROM "membervisibility" AS "membervisibility"
  GROUP BY
    ROLLUP (
      "membervisibility"."owner",
      "membervisibility"."member_visibility"
    )
  HAVING
    SUM("membervisibility"."total_members") > 0
)
SELECT
  rollupresults."owner" AS "owner",
  "mv"."owner_type" /* Join to get OWNER_TYPE */ AS "owner_type",
  rollupresults."member_visibility" AS "member_visibility",
  rollupresults."total_members" AS "total_members"
FROM "rollupresults" AS "rr"
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    "membervisibility"."owner" AS "owner",
    "membervisibility"."owner_type" AS "owner_type"
  FROM "membervisibility" AS "membervisibility"
) AS "mv"
  ON rollupresults."owner" = "mv"."owner"
ORDER BY
  rollupresults."owner",
  rollupresults."member_visibility"

question: Group biology courses by cluster type and course level. For each group, list the name of the department, the course title, cluster type, total enrollments, average enrollment within its cluster, course level, number of unique course materials, average new and used prices for TIP materials, total material record count for TIP materials, number of unique library titles, and number of unique library ISBNs.
sql:
WITH EnrollmentWithAnalytics AS (
    SELECT
        sos.SUBJECT_ID,
        sos.SUBJECT_TITLE,
        sos.OFFER_DEPT_NAME AS DEPARTMENT,
        sos.CLUSTER_TYPE,
        sos.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS,
        AVG(sos.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS) OVER (PARTITION BY sos.CLUSTER_TYPE) AS avg_enrollment_in_cluster,
        scd.COURSE_LEVEL
    FROM SUBJECT_OFFERED_SUMMARY sos
    LEFT JOIN SIS_COURSE_DESCRIPTION scd ON sos.COURSE_NUMBER = scd.COURSE
    WHERE sos.OFFER_DEPT_NAME = 'Biology' -- Restrict to Biology department
),
EnrollmentWithTIP AS (
    SELECT
        ewa.SUBJECT_ID,
        ewa.SUBJECT_TITLE,
        ewa.DEPARTMENT,
        ewa.CLUSTER_TYPE,
        ewa.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS,
        ewa.avg_enrollment_in_cluster,
        ewa.COURSE_LEVEL,
        tm.TITLE AS material_title,
        tm.NEW_SHELF_PRICE,
        tm.USED_SHELF_PRICE,
        td.RECORD_COUNT AS material_record_count
    FROM EnrollmentWithAnalytics ewa
    LEFT JOIN TIP_DETAIL td ON ewa.SUBJECT_ID = td.SUBJECT_ID
    LEFT JOIN TIP_MATERIAL tm ON td.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY = tm.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY
),
EnrollmentWithLibrary AS (
    SELECT
        ewt.SUBJECT_ID,
        ewt.SUBJECT_TITLE,
        ewt.DEPARTMENT,
        ewt.CLUSTER_TYPE,
        ewt.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS,
        ewt.avg_enrollment_in_cluster,
        ewt.COURSE_LEVEL,
        ewt.material_title,
        ewt.NEW_SHELF_PRICE,
        ewt.USED_SHELF_PRICE,
        ewt.material_record_count,
        lrc.CATALOG_TITLE AS library_title,
        lrc.CATALOG_AUTHOR_NAME AS library_author,
        lrc.CATALOG_ISBN AS library_isbn
    FROM EnrollmentWithTIP ewt
    LEFT JOIN LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG lrc ON ewt.SUBJECT_ID = lrc.CATALOG_SYSTEM_NUMBER
)
SELECT
    DEPARTMENT,
    SUBJECT_TITLE,
    CLUSTER_TYPE,
    SUM(NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS) AS total_enrollment,
    AVG(avg_enrollment_in_cluster) AS avg_enrollment_in_cluster,
    COURSE_LEVEL,
    COUNT(DISTINCT material_title) AS num_unique_materials,
    AVG(NEW_SHELF_PRICE) AS avg_new_material_price,
    AVG(USED_SHELF_PRICE) AS avg_used_material_price,
    SUM(material_record_count) AS total_material_records,
    COUNT(DISTINCT library_title) AS num_unique_library_titles,
    COUNT(DISTINCT library_isbn) AS num_unique_library_isbns
FROM EnrollmentWithLibrary
GROUP BY DEPARTMENT, SUBJECT_TITLE, CLUSTER_TYPE, COURSE_LEVEL
ORDER BY DEPARTMENT, SUBJECT_TITLE, CLUSTER_TYPE;
qualified:
WITH "enrollmentwithanalytics" AS (
  SELECT
    subject_offered_summary."subject_id" AS "subject_id",

    subject_offered_summary."offer_dept_name" = 'Biology' /* Restrict to Biology department */
), "enrollmentwithtip" AS (

    enrollmentwithanalytics."subject_id" AS "subject_id",

    enrollmentwithanalytics."department" AS "department",
    enrollmentwithanalytics."cluster_type" AS "cluster_type",

    enrollmentwithanalytics."avg_enrollment_in_cluster" AS "avg_enrollment_in_cluster",

    tip_material."title" AS "material_title",

    tip_material."used_shelf_price" AS "used_shelf_price",
    tip_detail."record_count" AS "material_record_count"
  FROM "enrollmentwithanalytics" AS "ewa"
  LEFT JOIN "tip_detail" AS "td"
    ON enrollmentwithanalytics."subject_id" = tip_detail."subject_id"
  LEFT JOIN "tip_material" AS "tm"
    ON tip_detail."tip_material_key" = tip_material."tip_material_key"

    enrollmentwithtip."cluster_type" AS "cluster_type",
    enrollmentwithtip."num_enrolled_students" AS "num_enrolled_students",
    enrollmentwithtip."avg_enrollment_in_cluster" AS "avg_enrollment_in_cluster",
    enrollmentwithtip."course_level" AS "course_level",
    enrollmentwithtip."material_title" AS "material_title",
    enrollmentwithtip."new_shelf_price" AS "new_shelf_price",
    enrollmentwithtip."used_shelf_price" AS "used_shelf_price",
    enrollmentwithtip."material_record_count" AS "material_record_count",
    library_reserve_catalog."catalog_title" AS "library_title",
    library_reserve_catalog."catalog_author_name" AS "library_author",
    library_reserve_catalog."catalog_isbn" AS "library_isbn"
  FROM "enrollmentwithtip" AS "ewt"
  LEFT JOIN "library_reserve_catalog" AS "lrc"
    ON enrollmentwithtip."subject_id" = library_reserve_catalog."catalog_system_number"
)
SELECT
  "enrollmentwithlibrary"."department" AS "department",
  "enrollmentwithlibrary"."subject_title" AS "subject_title",
  "enrollmentwithlibrary"."cluster_type" AS "cluster_type",
  SUM("enrollmentwithlibrary"."num_enrolled_students") AS "total_enrollment",
  AVG("enrollmentwithlibrary"."avg_enrollment_in_cluster") AS "avg_enrollment_in_cluster",
  "enrollmentwithlibrary"."course_level" AS "course_level",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "enrollmentwithlibrary"."material_title") AS "num_unique_materials",
  AVG("enrollmentwithlibrary"."new_shelf_price") AS "avg_new_material_price",
  AVG("enrollmentwithlibrary"."used_shelf_price") AS "avg_used_material_price",
  SUM("enrollmentwithlibrary"."material_record_count") AS "total_material_records",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "enrollmentwithlibrary"."library_title") AS "num_unique_library_titles",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "enrollmentwithlibrary"."library_isbn") AS "num_unique_library_isbns"
FROM "enrollmentwithlibrary" AS "enrollmentwithlibrary"
GROUP BY
  "enrollmentwithlibrary"."department",
  "enrollmentwithlibrary"."subject_title",
  "enrollmentwithlibrary"."cluster_type",
  "enrollmentwithlibrary"."course_level"
ORDER BY
  "department",
  "subject_title",
  "cluster_type"

question: For subjects offered this year in either the Fall or Spring term, list its department name, school name, subject ID, subject title, course level, total units, the term it is offered ('Spring' for Spring term and 'Fall' for Fall term), term description, the number of distinct instructors teaching in the Fall, and the number of distinct instructors teaching in the Spring.
sql:
WITH SubjectsByTerm AS (
    SELECT
        cc.SUBJECT_ID,
        cc.SUBJECT_TITLE,
        cc.TOTAL_UNITS,
        cc.DEPARTMENT_NAME,
        CASE 
            WHEN cc.TERM_CODE LIKE '%FA' THEN 'Fall'
            WHEN cc.TERM_CODE LIKE '%SP' THEN 'Spring'
        END AS offered_term, -- Map TERM_CODE to Fall or Spring
        at.TERM_DESCRIPTION AS term_description,
        sd.SCHOOL_NAME,
        scd.COURSE_LEVEL,
        cc.FALL_INSTRUCTORS,
        cc.SPRING_INSTRUCTORS
    FROM COURSE_CATALOG_SUBJECT_OFFERED cc
    JOIN ACADEMIC_TERMS at ON cc.TERM_CODE = at.TERM_CODE 
    LEFT JOIN SIS_DEPARTMENT sd ON cc.DEPARTMENT_CODE = sd.DEPARTMENT_CODE 
    LEFT JOIN SIS_COURSE_DESCRIPTION scd ON cc.SUBJECT_CODE = scd.COURSE 
    WHERE cc.IS_OFFERED_THIS_YEAR = 'Y'
      AND (cc.TERM_CODE LIKE '%FA' OR cc.TERM_CODE LIKE '%SP')  
),
SubjectsAggregated AS (
    SELECT
        SUBJECT_ID,
        SUBJECT_TITLE,
        DEPARTMENT_NAME,
        SCHOOL_NAME,
        COURSE_LEVEL,
        TOTAL_UNITS,
        offered_term,
        term_description,
        COUNT(DISTINCT FALL_INSTRUCTORS) AS num_fall_instructors,
        COUNT(DISTINCT SPRING_INSTRUCTORS) AS num_spring_instructors
    FROM SubjectsByTerm
    GROUP BY 
        SUBJECT_ID, SUBJECT_TITLE, DEPARTMENT_NAME, 
        SCHOOL_NAME, COURSE_LEVEL, TOTAL_UNITS, 
        offered_term, term_description
)
SELECT
    DEPARTMENT_NAME,
    SCHOOL_NAME,
    SUBJECT_ID,
    SUBJECT_TITLE,
    COURSE_LEVEL,
    TOTAL_UNITS,
    offered_term,
    term_description,
    num_fall_instructors,
    num_spring_instructors
FROM SubjectsAggregated
ORDER BY DEPARTMENT_NAME, SUBJECT_ID, SUBJECT_TITLE, offered_term;
qualified:

question: For Political Science courses with HASS attributes, for each attribute, list the name and description of the attribute, the number of unique subjects, average units, and the total enrollment.
sql:
WITH HASSAttributes AS (
    SELECT 
        cc.HASS_ATTRIBUTE,
        cc.HASS_ATTRIBUTE_DESC,
        cc.SUBJECT_ID,
        cc.SUBJECT_TITLE,
        cc.TOTAL_UNITS,
        sc.SUBJECT_CODE_DESC,
        sos.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS,
        sd.DEPARTMENT_NAME
    FROM 
        CIS_COURSE_CATALOG cc
    JOIN 
        SIS_SUBJECT_CODE sc ON cc.SUBJECT_CODE = sc.SUBJECT_CODE
    JOIN 
        SUBJECT_OFFERED_SUMMARY sos ON cc.SUBJECT_ID = sos.SUBJECT_ID
    LEFT JOIN 
        SIS_DEPARTMENT sd ON sc.DEPARTMENT_CODE = sd.DEPARTMENT_CODE
    WHERE 
        cc.HASS_ATTRIBUTE IS NOT NULL
        AND sd.DEPARTMENT_NAME = 'Political Science' 
)
SELECT 
    HASS_ATTRIBUTE,
    HASS_ATTRIBUTE_DESC,
    COUNT(DISTINCT SUBJECT_ID) AS num_subjects,
    AVG(TOTAL_UNITS) AS avg_units,
    SUM(NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS) AS total_enrollment
FROM 
    HASSAttributes
GROUP BY 
    HASS_ATTRIBUTE, HASS_ATTRIBUTE_DESC
ORDER BY 
    HASS_ATTRIBUTE, HASS_ATTRIBUTE_DESC;
qualified:
WITH "hassattributes" AS (
  SELECT
    cis_course_catalog."hass_attribute" AS "hass_attribute",
    cis_course_catalog."hass_attribute_desc" AS "hass_attribute_desc",
    cis_course_catalog."subject_id" AS "subject_id",
    cis_course_catalog."subject_title" AS "subject_title",
    cis_course_catalog."total_units" AS "total_units",
    sis_subject_code."subject_code_desc" AS "subject_code_desc",
    subject_offered_summary."num_enrolled_students" AS "num_enrolled_students",
    sis_department."department_name" AS "department_name"
  FROM "cis_course_catalog" AS "cc"
  JOIN "sis_subject_code" AS "sc"
    ON cis_course_catalog."subject_code" = sis_subject_code."subject_code"
  JOIN "subject_offered_summary" AS "sos"
    ON cis_course_catalog."subject_id" = subject_offered_summary."subject_id"
  LEFT JOIN "sis_department" AS "sd"
    ON sis_subject_code."department_code" = sis_department."department_code"
  WHERE
    NOT cis_course_catalog."hass_attribute" IS NULL
    AND sis_department."department_name" = 'Political Science'
)
SELECT
  "hassattributes"."hass_attribute" AS "hass_attribute",
  "hassattributes"."hass_attribute_desc" AS "hass_attribute_desc",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "hassattributes"."subject_id") AS "num_subjects",
  AVG("hassattributes"."total_units") AS "avg_units",
  SUM("hassattributes"."num_enrolled_students") AS "total_enrollment"
FROM "hassattributes" AS "hassattributes"
GROUP BY
  "hassattributes"."hass_attribute",
  "hassattributes"."hass_attribute_desc"
ORDER BY
  "hass_attribute",
  "hass_attribute_desc"

question: Group subjects by cluster type, department offering the subject, and the school name. For each group, list the cluster type, name of the department, school name, total number of subjects, total enrollment, and average enrollment. Exclude clusters or schools with no student data.
sql:
WITH ClusterSummary AS (
    SELECT
        sos.CLUSTER_TYPE,
        sos.OFFER_DEPT_NAME AS DEPARTMENT,
        sd.SCHOOL_NAME,
        COUNT(DISTINCT sos.SUBJECT_ID) AS num_subjects, 
        SUM(sos.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS) AS total_enrollment, 
        AVG(sos.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS) AS avg_enrollment
    FROM 
        SUBJECT_OFFERED_SUMMARY sos
    LEFT JOIN 
        SIS_COURSE_DESCRIPTION scd 
        ON sos.COURSE_NUMBER = scd.COURSE  
    LEFT JOIN 
        SIS_DEPARTMENT sd 
        ON sos.OFFER_DEPT_CODE = sd.DEPARTMENT_CODE  
    WHERE 
        sos.CLUSTER_TYPE IS NOT NULL
        AND sos.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS > 0 
        AND sd.SCHOOL_NAME IS NOT NULL 
    GROUP BY 
        sos.CLUSTER_TYPE, sos.OFFER_DEPT_NAME, sd.SCHOOL_NAME
)
SELECT
    CLUSTER_TYPE,
    DEPARTMENT,
    SCHOOL_NAME,
    num_subjects,
    total_enrollment,
    avg_enrollment
FROM 
    ClusterSummary
ORDER BY 
    CLUSTER_TYPE, DEPARTMENT, SCHOOL_NAME;
qualified:

  LEFT JOIN "sis_course_description" AS "scd"

  LEFT JOIN "sis_department" AS "sd"

  WHERE

question: Group classes that take place in buildings at MIT by the building name and course level. For each group, provide the name of the building, the course level ('Graduate' or 'Undergraduate'), the total number of unique courses of such level, and total instructors for these courses. Include subtotals for each building and course level and a grand total across all buildings and course levels.
sql:
WITH BuildingSubjectDetails AS (
    SELECT
        b.FAC_BUILDING_KEY,  
        b.BUILDING_NAME,
        s.SUBJECT_ID,
        CASE
            WHEN scd.COURSE_LEVEL = 'G' THEN 'Graduate'
            WHEN scd.COURSE_LEVEL = 'U' THEN 'Undergraduate'
            ELSE 'Other'
        END AS course_level,
        COUNT(DISTINCT s.RESPONSIBLE_FACULTY_NAME) AS num_instructors
    FROM FAC_BUILDING b
    JOIN SUBJECT_OFFERED_SUMMARY s ON b.FAC_BUILDING_KEY = s.OFFER_DEPT_CODE  
    JOIN SIS_COURSE_DESCRIPTION scd ON s.COURSE_NUMBER = scd.COURSE
    JOIN FAC_BUILDING_ADDRESS ba ON b.FAC_BUILDING_KEY = ba.BUILDING_KEY 
    WHERE b.SITE = 'MIT'
    GROUP BY b.FAC_BUILDING_KEY, b.BUILDING_NAME, s.SUBJECT_ID, scd.COURSE_LEVEL
),
BuildingAggregates AS (
    SELECT
        BUILDING_NAME,
        course_level,
        COUNT(DISTINCT SUBJECT_ID) AS unique_courses,
        SUM(num_instructors) AS total_instructors
    FROM BuildingSubjectDetails
    GROUP BY ROLLUP(BUILDING_NAME, course_level)
)
SELECT
    BUILDING_NAME,
    course_level,
    unique_courses,
    total_instructors
FROM BuildingAggregates
ORDER BY unique_courses DESC, BUILDING_NAME;

  JOIN "sis_course_description" AS "scd"

  JOIN "fac_building_address" AS "ba"
    ON fac_building."fac_building_key" = fac_building_address."building_key"
  WHERE
    fac_building."site" = 'MIT'
  GROUP BY
    fac_building."fac_building_key",

  FROM "buildingsubjectdetails" AS "buildingsubjectdetails"
  GROUP BY
    ROLLUP (

    )
)

question: For each course, provide the room number of course location, building name, building number, building city, building state, area, organization name, room usage, term code, course level, the total number of subjects, unique meeting times, and total units. Do not include meet place or meet times with NULL values.
sql:
WITH MeetingPlaceDetails AS (
    SELECT
        c.MEET_PLACE AS room_number,
        c.MEET_TIME,
        c.TERM_CODE,
        c.SUBJECT_ID,
        c.TOTAL_UNITS,
        b.BUILDING_NAME,
        b.BUILDING_NUMBER,
        ba.CITY AS building_city,
        ba.STATE AS building_state,
        fr.AREA,
        fr.ORGANIZATION_NAME,
        fmu.MAJOR_USE,
        scd.COURSE_LEVEL AS course_level,
        scd.COURSE_DESCRIPTION AS course_description
    FROM 
        COURSE_CATALOG_SUBJECT_OFFERED c
    JOIN 
        FAC_ROOMS fr ON c.MEET_PLACE = fr.ROOM 
    JOIN 
        FAC_BUILDING b ON fr.BUILDING_KEY = b.FAC_BUILDING_KEY  
    JOIN 
        FAC_MAJOR_USE fmu ON fr.MAJOR_USE_KEY = fmu.MAJOR_USE_KEY 
    LEFT JOIN 
        FAC_BUILDING_ADDRESS ba ON b.FAC_BUILDING_KEY = ba.BUILDING_KEY
    LEFT JOIN 
        SIS_COURSE_DESCRIPTION scd ON c.SUBJECT_ID = scd.COURSE
    WHERE 
        c.MEET_PLACE IS NOT NULL
        AND c.MEET_TIME IS NOT NULL
),
MeetingPlaceAggregates AS (
    SELECT
        room_number,
        BUILDING_NAME,
        BUILDING_NUMBER,
        building_city,
        building_state,
        AREA,
        ORGANIZATION_NAME,
        MAJOR_USE,
        TERM_CODE,
        course_level,
        COUNT(DISTINCT SUBJECT_ID) AS num_subjects,
        COUNT(DISTINCT MEET_TIME) AS unique_meet_times,
        SUM(TOTAL_UNITS) AS total_units
    FROM 
        MeetingPlaceDetails
    GROUP BY 
        room_number, BUILDING_NAME, BUILDING_NUMBER, building_city, 
        building_state, AREA, ORGANIZATION_NAME, MAJOR_USE, TERM_CODE, course_level
)
SELECT
  room_number,
    BUILDING_NAME,
    BUILDING_NUMBER,
    building_city,
    building_state,
    AREA,
    ORGANIZATION_NAME,
    MAJOR_USE,
    TERM_CODE,
    course_level,
    num_subjects,
    unique_meet_times,
    total_units
FROM 
    MeetingPlaceAggregates
ORDER BY 
    TERM_CODE, total_units DESC, room_number;

question: Consider only books cataloged on and after 2000. For each library material status and department, list the material status, department name, number of associated catalog items, and the total number of enrolled students in courses using those materials. Include subtotals for each material status and a grand total across all status (the corresponding status field is 'Grand Total').
sql:
WITH MaterialUsage AS (
    SELECT
        lms.LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS,
        sc.SUBJECT_CODE_DESC AS department,
        COUNT(DISTINCT lrc.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY) AS num_catalog_items,
        SUM(lso.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS) AS total_students
    FROM LIBRARY_RESERVE_MATRL_DETAIL lrd
    JOIN LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS lms ON lrd.LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY = lms.LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY
    JOIN LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG lrc ON lrd.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY = lrc.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY
    JOIN LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED lso ON lrd.LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY = lso.LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY
    LEFT JOIN SIS_SUBJECT_CODE sc ON lso.COURSE_NUMBER = sc.COURSE_NUMBER
    WHERE lrc.CATALOG_YEAR >= 2000
    GROUP BY lms.LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS, sc.SUBJECT_CODE_DESC
),
MaterialSubtotals AS (
    SELECT
        LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS,
        NULL AS department,
        SUM(num_catalog_items) AS total_catalog_items,
        SUM(total_students) AS total_students
    FROM MaterialUsage
    GROUP BY LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS
),
MaterialGrandTotal AS (
    SELECT
        'Grand Total' AS LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS,
        NULL AS department,
        SUM(num_catalog_items) AS total_catalog_items,
        SUM(total_students) AS total_students
    FROM MaterialUsage
),
MaterialCombined AS (
    SELECT 
        LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS,
        department,
        num_catalog_items,
        total_students
    FROM MaterialUsage
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS,
        department,
        total_catalog_items,
        total_students
    FROM MaterialSubtotals
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS,
        department,
        total_catalog_items,
        total_students
    FROM MaterialGrandTotal
)
SELECT
    COALESCE(LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS, 'Subtotal') AS library_material_status,
    department,
    num_catalog_items,
    total_students
FROM MaterialCombined
ORDER BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS = 'Grand Total' THEN 1 
        WHEN department IS NULL THEN 2
        ELSE 0 
    END,
    LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS,
    department;
qualified:

  SELECT

    sis_subject_code."subject_code_desc" AS "department",

question: For each department in the library system, list the name of the department, total number of courses using library materials, the number of catalog items associated with those courses, and the average enrollment per course. Include a grand total across all departments (the corresponding department field should be 'Grand Total').
sql:
WITH DepartmentLibraryUsage AS (
    SELECT
        lci.DEPARTMENT,
        lci.COURSE_NAME,
        COUNT(DISTINCT lrc.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY) AS num_catalog_items,
        SUM(lso.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS) AS total_students
    FROM LIBRARY_RESERVE_MATRL_DETAIL lrd
    JOIN LIBRARY_COURSE_INSTRUCTOR lci ON lrd.LIBRARY_COURSE_INSTRUCTOR_KEY = lci.LIBRARY_COURSE_INSTRUCTOR_KEY
    JOIN LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG lrc ON lrd.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY = lrc.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY
    JOIN LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED lso ON lrd.LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY = lso.LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY
    WHERE lso.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS > 0 
    GROUP BY lci.DEPARTMENT, lci.COURSE_NAME
),
DepartmentAggregates AS (
    SELECT
        DEPARTMENT,
        COUNT(DISTINCT COURSE_NAME) AS total_courses,  
        SUM(num_catalog_items) AS total_catalog_items,
        AVG(total_students) AS avg_students_per_course
    FROM DepartmentLibraryUsage
    GROUP BY DEPARTMENT
),
GrandTotal AS (
    SELECT
        'Grand Total' AS DEPARTMENT,
        SUM(total_courses) AS total_courses,
        SUM(total_catalog_items) AS total_catalog_items,
        AVG(avg_students_per_course) AS avg_students_per_course
    FROM DepartmentAggregates
)
SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT * FROM GrandTotal
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM DepartmentAggregates
) CombinedResults
ORDER BY 
    CASE WHEN DEPARTMENT = 'Grand Total' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, 
    DEPARTMENT;
qualified:
WITH "departmentlibraryusage" AS (
  SELECT
    library_course_instructor."department" AS "department",
    library_course_instructor."course_name" AS "course_name",
    COUNT(DISTINCT library_reserve_catalog."library_reserve_catalog_key") AS "num_catalog_items",

  JOIN "library_course_instructor" AS "lci"
    ON library_reserve_matrl_detail."library_course_instructor_key" = library_course_instructor."library_course_instructor_key"
  JOIN "library_reserve_catalog" AS "lrc"
    ON library_reserve_matrl_detail."library_reserve_catalog_key" = library_reserve_catalog."library_reserve_catalog_key"
  JOIN "library_subject_offered" AS "lso"
    ON library_reserve_matrl_detail."library_subject_offered_key" = library_subject_offered."library_subject_offered_key"
  WHERE
    library_subject_offered."num_enrolled_students" > 0
  GROUP BY
    library_course_instructor."department",
    library_course_instructor."course_name"
), "departmentaggregates" AS (
  SELECT
    "departmentlibraryusage"."department" AS "department",
    COUNT(DISTINCT "departmentlibraryusage"."course_name") AS "total_courses",
    SUM("departmentlibraryusage"."num_catalog_items") AS "total_catalog_items",
    AVG("departmentlibraryusage"."total_students") AS "avg_students_per_course"
  FROM "departmentlibraryusage" AS "departmentlibraryusage"
  GROUP BY
    "departmentlibraryusage"."department"
), "grandtotal" AS (
  SELECT
    'Grand Total' AS "department",
    SUM("departmentaggregates"."total_courses") AS "total_courses",
    SUM("departmentaggregates"."total_catalog_items") AS "total_catalog_items",
    AVG("departmentaggregates"."avg_students_per_course") AS "avg_students_per_course"
  FROM "departmentaggregates" AS "departmentaggregates"
)
SELECT
  "combinedresults"."department" AS "department",
  "combinedresults"."total_courses" AS "total_courses",
  "combinedresults"."total_catalog_items" AS "total_catalog_items",
  "combinedresults"."avg_students_per_course" AS "avg_students_per_course"
FROM (
  SELECT
    "grandtotal"."department" AS "department",
    "grandtotal"."total_courses" AS "total_courses",
    "grandtotal"."total_catalog_items" AS "total_catalog_items",
    "grandtotal"."avg_students_per_course" AS "avg_students_per_course"
  FROM "grandtotal" AS "grandtotal"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    "departmentaggregates"."department" AS "department",
    "departmentaggregates"."total_courses" AS "total_courses",
    "departmentaggregates"."total_catalog_items" AS "total_catalog_items",
    "departmentaggregates"."avg_students_per_course" AS "avg_students_per_course"
  FROM "departmentaggregates" AS "departmentaggregates"
) AS "combinedresults"
ORDER BY
  CASE WHEN "combinedresults"."department" = 'Grand Total' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,

question: For each department and school offering courses with materials, list the department name, school name, number of unique course materials, number of courses, average new and used shelf prices of materials, total material records, and number of distinct material statuses. Include a grand total across all schools and departments (the corresponding school and department fields should be null).
sql:
WITH MaterialCostDetails AS (
    SELECT
        tso.OFFER_DEPT_NAME AS department_name,
        tso.SUBJECT_TITLE,
        tm.TITLE AS material_title,
        tm.NEW_SHELF_PRICE,
        tm.USED_SHELF_PRICE,
        tso.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS,
        tms.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS AS material_status,
        tms.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS_CODE AS material_status_code,
        td.RECORD_COUNT AS material_record_count,
        ts.SCHOOL_NAME AS school_name 
    FROM TIP_DETAIL td
    JOIN TIP_MATERIAL tm ON td.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY = tm.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY
    JOIN TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED tso ON td.TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY = tso.TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY
    JOIN TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS tms ON td.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY = tms.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY
    JOIN SIS_DEPARTMENT ts ON tso.OFFER_DEPT_CODE = ts.DEPARTMENT_CODE
    WHERE tso.IS_NO_COURSE_MATERIAL = 'N' 
),
MaterialCostAggregates AS (
    SELECT
        department_name,
        school_name, -- Added SCHOOL_NAME for aggregation
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_title) AS num_unique_materials,
        COUNT(DISTINCT SUBJECT_TITLE) AS num_courses,
        AVG(NEW_SHELF_PRICE) AS avg_new_price,
        AVG(USED_SHELF_PRICE) AS avg_used_price,
        SUM(material_record_count) AS total_material_records,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_status) AS num_material_statuses
    FROM MaterialCostDetails
    GROUP BY department_name, school_name
),
GrandTotal AS (
    SELECT
        NULL AS department_name,
        NULL AS school_name,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_title) AS num_unique_materials,
        COUNT(DISTINCT SUBJECT_TITLE) AS num_courses,

        SUM(material_record_count) AS total_material_records,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_status) AS num_material_statuses
    FROM MaterialCostDetails
)
SELECT

    school_name,
    num_unique_materials,
    num_courses,
    avg_new_price,
    avg_used_price,
    total_material_records,
    num_material_statuses
FROM MaterialCostAggregates
UNION ALL

    school_name,
    num_unique_materials,
    num_courses,
    avg_new_price,
    avg_used_price,
    total_material_records,
    num_material_statuses
FROM GrandTotal
ORDER BY school_name, department_name;

question: For each TIP material status, list the total number of unique materials associated with the status, the total number of records associated with the status, and the total student enrollment associated with the status. Any material status with null values should be displayed as 'No material status'. Additionally, include a grand total across all material status (the material status for this row should be displayed as 'Grand Total').
sql:
WITH MaterialStatusDetails AS (
    SELECT
        tms.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS AS material_status,
        tm.TITLE AS material_title,
        td.RECORD_COUNT,
        tso.NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS
    FROM TIP_DETAIL td
    JOIN TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS tms ON td.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY = tms.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY
    JOIN TIP_MATERIAL tm ON td.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY = tm.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY
    JOIN TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED tso ON td.TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY = tso.TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY
    WHERE td.RECORD_COUNT > 0 
),
MaterialStatusAggregates AS (
    SELECT
        CASE
            WHEN GROUPING(material_status) = 1 THEN NULL  
            WHEN material_status IS NULL THEN 'No material status'
            ELSE material_status
        END AS material_status,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_title) AS num_materials,
        SUM(RECORD_COUNT) AS total_record_count,
        SUM(NUM_ENROLLED_STUDENTS) AS total_enrollment
    FROM MaterialStatusDetails
    GROUP BY ROLLUP(material_status)
)
SELECT
    COALESCE(material_status, 'Grand Total') AS material_status,
    num_materials,
    total_record_count,
    total_enrollment
FROM MaterialStatusAggregates
ORDER BY 
    CASE WHEN material_status = 'Grand Total' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, 
    total_record_count DESC, 
    material_status;
qualified:
WITH "materialstatusdetails" AS (
  SELECT
    tip_material_status."tip_material_status" AS "material_status",
    tip_material."title" AS "material_title",
    tip_detail."record_count" AS "record_count",
    tip_subject_offered."num_enrolled_students" AS "num_enrolled_students"
  FROM "tip_detail" AS "td"
  JOIN "tip_material_status" AS "tms"
    ON tip_detail."tip_material_status_key" = tip_material_status."tip_material_status_key"
  JOIN "tip_material" AS "tm"
    ON tip_detail."tip_material_key" = tip_material."tip_material_key"
  JOIN "tip_subject_offered" AS "tso"
    ON tip_detail."tip_subject_offered_key" = tip_subject_offered."tip_subject_offered_key"
  WHERE
    tip_detail."record_count" > 0
), "materialstatusaggregates" AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN GROUPING("materialstatusdetails"."material_status") = 1
      THEN NULL
      WHEN "materialstatusdetails"."material_status" IS NULL
      THEN 'No material status'
      ELSE "materialstatusdetails"."material_status"
    END AS "material_status",
    COUNT(DISTINCT "materialstatusdetails"."material_title") AS "num_materials",
    SUM("materialstatusdetails"."record_count") AS "total_record_count",
    SUM("materialstatusdetails"."num_enrolled_students") AS "total_enrollment"
  FROM "materialstatusdetails" AS "materialstatusdetails"
  GROUP BY
    ROLLUP (
      "materialstatusdetails"."material_status"
    )
)
SELECT
  COALESCE("materialstatusaggregates"."material_status", 'Grand Total') AS "material_status",
  "materialstatusaggregates"."num_materials" AS "num_materials",
  "materialstatusaggregates"."total_record_count" AS "total_record_count",
  "materialstatusaggregates"."total_enrollment" AS "total_enrollment"
FROM "materialstatusaggregates" AS "materialstatusaggregates"
ORDER BY
  CASE WHEN "material_status" = 'Grand Total' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,
  "total_record_count" DESC,
  "material_status"

question: For each room, list its associated building name, floor number, room number, ownership type, number of rooms, area, and percentage of area relative to the building. Include subtotals across floors, subtotals across all floors for each building, and a grand total across all buildings. For the subtotal for each building and the grand total, the percentage of area should be relative to area of all buildings. All numeric values should be rounded to integers and formatted using commas as thousands separators except the relative percentages which should be rounded to two decimal places.
sql:
WITH FloorStats AS (
    SELECT
        f.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY,
        b.BUILDING_NAME_LONG AS Building_Name,
        f.FLOOR,
        r.BUILDING_ROOM AS Room,
        COUNT(r.FCLT_ROOM_KEY) AS Room_Count,
        SUM(r.AREA) AS Total_Floor_Area,
        SUM(SUM(r.AREA)) OVER (PARTITION BY f.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY) AS Building_Total_Area,
        SUM(SUM(r.AREA)) OVER () AS Overall_Total_Area,
        b.OWNERSHIP_TYPE
    FROM
        FCLT_FLOOR f
    LEFT JOIN
        FCLT_ROOMS r ON f.FCLT_FLOOR_KEY = r.FCLT_FLOOR_KEY
    LEFT JOIN
        FCLT_BUILDING b ON f.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY = b.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY
    LEFT JOIN
        FCLT_ORGANIZATION o ON b.COST_COLLECTOR_KEY = o.FCLT_ORGANIZATION_KEY
    GROUP BY
        f.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY, b.BUILDING_NAME_LONG, f.FLOOR, r.BUILDING_ROOM, b.OWNERSHIP_TYPE
),
RollupWithPercentages AS (
    SELECT
        Building_Name,
        FLOOR,
        CASE 
            WHEN GROUPING(Room) = 0 THEN Room 
            ELSE NULL 
        END AS Room,
        CASE 
            WHEN GROUPING_ID(Building_Name, FLOOR, Room) > 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE OWNERSHIP_TYPE
        END AS OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
        SUM(Room_Count) AS Total_Rooms,
        SUM(Total_Floor_Area) AS Total_Area,
        MAX(Building_Total_Area) AS Building_Total_Area,
        MAX(Overall_Total_Area) AS Overall_Total_Area
    FROM
        FloorStats
    GROUP BY
        ROLLUP(Building_Name, FLOOR, Room),
        OWNERSHIP_TYPE
),
GrandTotal AS (
    SELECT
        NULL AS Building_Name,
        NULL AS FLOOR,
        NULL AS Room,
        NULL AS OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
        SUM(Total_Rooms) AS Total_Rooms,
        SUM(Total_Area) AS Total_Area,
        NULL AS Building_Total_Area,
        MAX(Overall_Total_Area) AS Overall_Total_Area,
        0 AS SortOrder,
        100 AS Percent_Of_Total -- Explicitly set the grand total percentage to 100
    FROM
        RollupWithPercentages
    WHERE
        Building_Name IS NOT NULL
),
AllData AS (
    SELECT 
        0 AS SortOrder,
        Building_Name,
        FLOOR,
        Room,
        NULL AS OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
        Total_Rooms,
        Total_Area,
        Percent_Of_Total
    FROM GrandTotal
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        1 AS SortOrder,
        Building_Name,
        FLOOR,
        Room,
        CASE 
            WHEN Building_Name IS NOT NULL THEN OWNERSHIP_TYPE
            ELSE NULL
        END AS OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
        Total_Rooms,
        Total_Area,
        CASE
            WHEN FLOOR IS NOT NULL AND Building_Total_Area > 0 THEN ROUND(Total_Area * 100.0 / Building_Total_Area, 2)
            WHEN FLOOR IS NULL AND Building_Name IS NOT NULL AND Overall_Total_Area > 0 THEN ROUND(Total_Area * 100.0 / Overall_Total_Area, 2)
            ELSE NULL
        END AS Percent_Of_Total
    FROM RollupWithPercentages
)
SELECT 
    Building_Name,
    FLOOR,
    Room,
    OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
    TO_CHAR(Total_Rooms, '999,999') AS Total_Rooms,
    TO_CHAR(Total_Area, '999,999,999') AS Total_Area,
    Percent_Of_Total
FROM 
    AllData
ORDER BY 
    SortOrder,
    Building_Name,
    FLOOR,
    Room;
qualified:
WITH "floorstats" AS (
  SELECT
    fclt_floor."fclt_building_key" AS "fclt_building_key",
    fclt_building."building_name_long" AS "building_name",
    fclt_floor."floor" AS "floor",
    fclt_rooms."building_room" AS "room",
    COUNT(fclt_rooms."fclt_room_key") AS "room_count",
    SUM(fclt_rooms."area") AS "total_floor_area",
    SUM(SUM(fclt_rooms."area")) OVER (PARTITION BY fclt_floor."fclt_building_key") AS "building_total_area",
    SUM(SUM(fclt_rooms."area")) OVER () AS "overall_total_area",
    fclt_building."ownership_type" AS "ownership_type"
  FROM "fclt_floor" AS "f"
  LEFT JOIN "fclt_rooms" AS "r"
    ON fclt_floor."fclt_floor_key" = fclt_rooms."fclt_floor_key"
  LEFT JOIN "fclt_building" AS "b"
    ON fclt_floor."fclt_building_key" = fclt_building."fclt_building_key"
  LEFT JOIN "fclt_organization" AS "o"
    ON fclt_building."cost_collector_key" = fclt_organization."fclt_organization_key"
  GROUP BY
    fclt_floor."fclt_building_key",
    fclt_building."building_name_long",
    fclt_floor."floor",
    fclt_rooms."building_room",
    fclt_building."ownership_type"
), "rollupwithpercentages" AS (
  SELECT
    "floorstats"."building_name" AS "building_name",
    "floorstats"."floor" AS "floor",
    CASE WHEN GROUPING("floorstats"."room") = 0 THEN "floorstats"."room" ELSE NULL END AS "room",
    CASE
      WHEN GROUPING_ID("floorstats"."building_name", "floorstats"."floor", "floorstats"."room") > 0
      THEN NULL
      ELSE "floorstats"."ownership_type"
    END AS "ownership_type",
    SUM("floorstats"."room_count") AS "total_rooms",
    SUM("floorstats"."total_floor_area") AS "total_area",
    MAX("floorstats"."building_total_area") AS "building_total_area",
    MAX("floorstats"."overall_total_area") AS "overall_total_area"
  FROM "floorstats" AS "floorstats"
  GROUP BY
    "floorstats"."ownership_type",
    ROLLUP (
      "floorstats"."building_name",
      "floorstats"."floor",
      "floorstats"."room"
    )
), "grandtotal" AS (
  SELECT
    NULL AS "building_name",
    NULL AS "floor",
    NULL AS "room",
    NULL AS "ownership_type",
    SUM("rollupwithpercentages"."total_rooms") AS "total_rooms",
    SUM("rollupwithpercentages"."total_area") AS "total_area",
    NULL AS "building_total_area",
    MAX("rollupwithpercentages"."overall_total_area") AS "overall_total_area",
    0 AS "sortorder",
    100 AS "percent_of_total" /* Explicitly set the grand total percentage to 100 */
  FROM "rollupwithpercentages" AS "rollupwithpercentages"
  WHERE
    NOT "rollupwithpercentages"."building_name" IS NULL
), "alldata" AS (
  SELECT
    0 AS "sortorder",
    "grandtotal"."building_name" AS "building_name",
    "grandtotal"."floor" AS "floor",
    "grandtotal"."room" AS "room",
    NULL AS "ownership_type",
    "grandtotal"."total_rooms" AS "total_rooms",
    "grandtotal"."total_area" AS "total_area",
    "grandtotal"."percent_of_total" AS "percent_of_total"
  FROM "grandtotal" AS "grandtotal"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    1 AS "sortorder",
    "rollupwithpercentages"."building_name" AS "building_name",
    "rollupwithpercentages"."floor" AS "floor",
    "rollupwithpercentages"."room" AS "room",
    CASE
      WHEN NOT "rollupwithpercentages"."building_name" IS NULL
      THEN "rollupwithpercentages"."ownership_type"
      ELSE NULL
    END AS "ownership_type",
    "rollupwithpercentages"."total_rooms" AS "total_rooms",
    "rollupwithpercentages"."total_area" AS "total_area",
    CASE
      WHEN NOT "rollupwithpercentages"."floor" IS NULL
      AND "rollupwithpercentages"."building_total_area" > 0
      THEN ROUND(
        "rollupwithpercentages"."total_area" * 100.0 / NULLIF("rollupwithpercentages"."building_total_area", 0),
        2
      )
      WHEN "rollupwithpercentages"."floor" IS NULL
      AND NOT "rollupwithpercentages"."building_name" IS NULL
      AND "rollupwithpercentages"."overall_total_area" > 0
      THEN ROUND(
        "rollupwithpercentages"."total_area" * 100.0 / NULLIF("rollupwithpercentages"."overall_total_area", 0),
        2
      )
      ELSE NULL
    END AS "percent_of_total"
  FROM "rollupwithpercentages" AS "rollupwithpercentages"
)
SELECT
  "alldata"."building_name" AS "building_name",
  "alldata"."floor" AS "floor",
  "alldata"."room" AS "room",
  "alldata"."ownership_type" AS "ownership_type",
  CAST("alldata"."total_rooms" AS TEXT) AS "total_rooms",
  CAST("alldata"."total_area" AS TEXT) AS "total_area",
  "alldata"."percent_of_total" AS "percent_of_total"
FROM "alldata" AS "alldata"
ORDER BY
  "alldata"."sortorder",
  "building_name",
  "floor",
  "room"

question: For each financial aid year and academic year, list the number of fiscal periods, quarters, the first and last term date, and number of distinct department-level term parameters.
sql:
WITH FinancialAidDetails AS (
    SELECT 
        at.TERM_CODE,
        at.TERM_DESCRIPTION,
        at.ACADEMIC_YEAR,
        at.FINANCIAL_AID_YEAR,
        td.START_DATE AS Term_Start_Date,
        td.END_DATE AS Term_End_Date,
        tm.FISCAL_PERIOD,
        tm.FISCAL_YEAR,
        tq.FY_QUARTER_CODE,
        tq.QUARTER_START_DATE,
        tq.QUARTER_END_DATE,
        tp.TERM_PARAMETER AS Dept_Term_Param
    FROM 
        ACADEMIC_TERMS at
    JOIN 
        TIME_DAY td ON at.TERM_START_DATE = td.CALENDAR_DATE
    JOIN 
        TIME_MONTH tm ON td.FISCAL_PERIOD = tm.FISCAL_PERIOD AND td.FISCAL_YEAR = tm.FISCAL_YEAR
    JOIN 
        TIME_QUARTER tq ON tm.FISCAL_YEAR = tq.FISCAL_YEAR AND tm.FY_QUARTER_CODE = tq.FY_QUARTER_CODE
    LEFT JOIN 
        ACADEMIC_TERM_PARAMETER tp ON at.TERM_CODE = tp.TERM_CODE
    WHERE 
        at.FINANCIAL_AID_YEAR IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 
    FINANCIAL_AID_YEAR,
    ACADEMIC_YEAR,
    COUNT(DISTINCT FISCAL_PERIOD) AS Total_Fiscal_Periods,
    COUNT(DISTINCT FY_QUARTER_CODE) AS Total_Quarters,
    MIN(Term_Start_Date) AS First_Term_Start_Date,
    MAX(Term_End_Date) AS Last_Term_End_Date,
    COUNT(DISTINCT Dept_Term_Param) AS Distinct_Term_Params
FROM 
    FinancialAidDetails
GROUP BY 
    FINANCIAL_AID_YEAR, ACADEMIC_YEAR
ORDER BY 
    FINANCIAL_AID_YEAR DESC, ACADEMIC_YEAR ASC;
qualified:
WITH "financialaiddetails" AS (
  SELECT
    academic_terms."term_code" AS "term_code",
    academic_terms."term_description" AS "term_description",
    academic_terms."academic_year" AS "academic_year",
    academic_terms."financial_aid_year" AS "financial_aid_year",
    time_day."start_date" AS "term_start_date",
    time_day."end_date" AS "term_end_date",
    time_month."fiscal_period" AS "fiscal_period",
    time_month."fiscal_year" AS "fiscal_year",
    time_quarter."fy_quarter_code" AS "fy_quarter_code",
    time_quarter."quarter_start_date" AS "quarter_start_date",
    time_quarter."quarter_end_date" AS "quarter_end_date",
    academic_term_parameter."term_parameter" AS "dept_term_param"
  FROM "academic_terms" AS "at"
  JOIN "time_day" AS "td"
    ON academic_terms."term_start_date" = time_day."calendar_date"
  JOIN "time_month" AS "tm"
    ON time_day."fiscal_period" = time_month."fiscal_period"
    AND time_day."fiscal_year" = time_month."fiscal_year"
  JOIN "time_quarter" AS "tq"
    ON time_month."fiscal_year" = time_quarter."fiscal_year"
    AND time_month."fy_quarter_code" = time_quarter."fy_quarter_code"
  LEFT JOIN "academic_term_parameter" AS "tp"
    ON academic_terms."term_code" = academic_term_parameter."term_code"
  WHERE
    NOT academic_terms."financial_aid_year" IS NULL
)
SELECT
  "financialaiddetails"."financial_aid_year" AS "financial_aid_year",
  "financialaiddetails"."academic_year" AS "academic_year",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "financialaiddetails"."fiscal_period") AS "total_fiscal_periods",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "financialaiddetails"."fy_quarter_code") AS "total_quarters",
  MIN("financialaiddetails"."term_start_date") AS "first_term_start_date",
  MAX("financialaiddetails"."term_end_date") AS "last_term_end_date",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "financialaiddetails"."dept_term_param") AS "distinct_term_params"
FROM "financialaiddetails" AS "financialaiddetails"
GROUP BY
  "financialaiddetails"."financial_aid_year",
  "financialaiddetails"."academic_year"
ORDER BY
  "financial_aid_year" DESC,
  "academic_year" ASC

question: Group buildings by campus sectors. For each group, list the campus sector, name of the building, city and state where the building is located, total number of floors, total assignable area, total number of rooms, total number of organizations, ownership type, and a rank column indicating the order (1-indexed) of this row within each sector based on the descending order of assignable area. Include subtotals for each sector and a grand total across all sectors. The subtotal and grand total only need to computed over the total number of floors and assignable area.
sql:
WITH BuildingArea AS (
    SELECT 
        b.CAMPUS_SECTOR,
        b.BUILDING_NAME_LONG AS Building_Name,
        f.FLOOR AS Floor_Number,
        b.ASSIGNABLE_AREA,
        ba.CITY AS Building_City,
        ba.STATE AS Building_State
    FROM 
        FCLT_BUILDING b
    LEFT JOIN 
        FCLT_FLOOR f ON b.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY = f.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY
    LEFT JOIN 
        FCLT_BUILDING_ADDRESS ba ON b.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY = ba.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY
),
TotalRooms AS (
    SELECT 
        b.BUILDING_NAME_LONG AS Building_Name,
        COUNT(r.FCLT_ROOM_KEY) AS Total_Rooms
    FROM 
        FCLT_BUILDING b
    LEFT JOIN 
        FCLT_ROOMS r ON b.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY = r.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY
    GROUP BY 
        b.BUILDING_NAME_LONG
),
TotalOrganizations AS (
    SELECT 
        b.BUILDING_NAME_LONG AS Building_Name,
        COUNT(DISTINCT o.FCLT_ORGANIZATION_KEY) AS Total_Organizations
    FROM 
        FCLT_BUILDING b
    LEFT JOIN 
        FCLT_ROOMS r ON b.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY = r.FCLT_BUILDING_KEY
    LEFT JOIN 
        FCLT_ORGANIZATION o ON r.FCLT_ORGANIZATION_KEY = o.FCLT_ORGANIZATION_KEY
    GROUP BY 
        b.BUILDING_NAME_LONG
),
BuildingDetails AS (
    SELECT 
        b.BUILDING_NAME_LONG AS Building_Name,
        b.OWNERSHIP_TYPE AS Ownership_Type
    FROM 
        FCLT_BUILDING b
),
RollupRows AS (
    SELECT 
        CASE WHEN GROUPING(CAMPUS_SECTOR) = 1 THEN NULL ELSE CAMPUS_SECTOR END AS Campus_Sector,
        CASE WHEN GROUPING(Building_Name) = 1 THEN NULL ELSE Building_Name END AS Building_Name,
        CASE WHEN GROUPING(Building_Name) = 1 THEN NULL ELSE MAX(Building_City) END AS Building_City,
        CASE WHEN GROUPING(Building_Name) = 1 THEN NULL ELSE MAX(Building_State) END AS Building_State,
        COUNT(DISTINCT Floor_Number) AS Total_Floors,
        SUM(ASSIGNABLE_AREA) AS Assignable_Area
    FROM 
        BuildingArea
    GROUP BY 
        ROLLUP(CAMPUS_SECTOR, Building_Name)
),
RankedRows AS (
    SELECT 
        rr.Campus_Sector,
        rr.Building_Name,
        rr.Building_City,
        rr.Building_State,
        rr.Total_Floors,
        rr.Assignable_Area,
        tr.Total_Rooms,
        toz.Total_Organizations,
        bd.Ownership_Type,
        CASE 
            WHEN rr.Building_Name IS NOT NULL THEN 
                RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY rr.Campus_Sector ORDER BY rr.Assignable_Area DESC) - 1
            ELSE NULL
        END AS Adjusted_Sector_Rank
    FROM 
        RollupRows rr
    LEFT JOIN 
        TotalRooms tr ON rr.Building_Name = tr.Building_Name
    LEFT JOIN 
        TotalOrganizations toz ON rr.Building_Name = toz.Building_Name
    LEFT JOIN 
        BuildingDetails bd ON rr.Building_Name = bd.Building_Name
    WHERE rr.Campus_Sector IS NOT NULL
),
GrandTotal AS (
    SELECT 
        NULL AS Campus_Sector,
        NULL AS Building_Name,
        NULL AS Building_City,
        NULL AS Building_State,
        SUM(Total_Floors) AS Total_Floors,
        SUM(Assignable_Area) AS Assignable_Area,
        NULL AS Total_Rooms,
        NULL AS Total_Organizations,
        NULL AS Ownership_Type,
        1 AS Adjusted_Sector_Rank
    FROM 
        RankedRows
)
SELECT 
    Campus_Sector,
    Building_Name,
    Building_City,
    Building_State,
    Total_Floors,
    TO_CHAR(Assignable_Area, '999,999,999') AS Assignable_Area,
    Total_Rooms,
    Total_Organizations,
    Ownership_Type,
    Adjusted_Sector_Rank
FROM 
    RankedRows
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Campus_Sector,
    Building_Name,
    NULL AS Building_City,
    NULL AS Building_State,
    Total_Floors,
    TO_CHAR(Assignable_Area, '999,999,999') AS Assignable_Area,
    NULL AS Total_Rooms,  
    NULL AS Total_Organizations, 
    Ownership_Type,
    Adjusted_Sector_Rank
FROM 
    GrandTotal
ORDER BY 
    Campus_Sector,
    Adjusted_Sector_Rank,
    Building_Name;
qualified:
WITH "buildingarea" AS (
  SELECT
    fclt_building."campus_sector" AS "campus_sector",
    fclt_building."building_name_long" AS "building_name",
    fclt_floor."floor" AS "floor_number",
    fclt_building."assignable_area" AS "assignable_area",
    fclt_building_address."city" AS "building_city",
    fclt_building_address."state" AS "building_state"
  FROM "fclt_building" AS "b"
  LEFT JOIN "fclt_floor" AS "f"
    ON fclt_building."fclt_building_key" = fclt_floor."fclt_building_key"
  LEFT JOIN "fclt_building_address" AS "ba"
    ON fclt_building."fclt_building_key" = fclt_building_address."fclt_building_key"
), "totalrooms" AS (
  SELECT
    fclt_building."building_name_long" AS "building_name",
    COUNT(fclt_rooms."fclt_room_key") AS "total_rooms"
  FROM "fclt_building" AS "b"
  LEFT JOIN "fclt_rooms" AS "r"
    ON fclt_building."fclt_building_key" = fclt_rooms."fclt_building_key"
  GROUP BY
    fclt_building."building_name_long"
), "totalorganizations" AS (
  SELECT
    fclt_building."building_name_long" AS "building_name",
    COUNT(DISTINCT fclt_organization."fclt_organization_key") AS "total_organizations"
  FROM "fclt_building" AS "b"
  LEFT JOIN "fclt_rooms" AS "r"
    ON fclt_building."fclt_building_key" = fclt_rooms."fclt_building_key"
  LEFT JOIN "fclt_organization" AS "o"
    ON fclt_rooms."fclt_organization_key" = fclt_organization."fclt_organization_key"
  GROUP BY
    fclt_building."building_name_long"
), "buildingdetails" AS (
  SELECT
    fclt_building."building_name_long" AS "building_name",
    fclt_building."ownership_type" AS "ownership_type"
  FROM "fclt_building" AS "b"
), "rolluprows" AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN GROUPING("buildingarea"."campus_sector") = 1
      THEN NULL
      ELSE "buildingarea"."campus_sector"
    END AS "campus_sector",
    CASE
      WHEN GROUPING("buildingarea"."building_name") = 1
      THEN NULL
      ELSE "buildingarea"."building_name"
    END AS "building_name",
    CASE
      WHEN GROUPING("buildingarea"."building_name") = 1
      THEN NULL
      ELSE MAX("buildingarea"."building_city")
    END AS "building_city",
    CASE
      WHEN GROUPING("buildingarea"."building_name") = 1
      THEN NULL
      ELSE MAX("buildingarea"."building_state")
    END AS "building_state",
    COUNT(DISTINCT "buildingarea"."floor_number") AS "total_floors",
    SUM("buildingarea"."assignable_area") AS "assignable_area"
  FROM "buildingarea" AS "buildingarea"
  GROUP BY
    ROLLUP (
      "buildingarea"."campus_sector",
      "buildingarea"."building_name"
    )
), "rankedrows" AS (
  SELECT
    rolluprows."campus_sector" AS "campus_sector",
    rolluprows."building_name" AS "building_name",
    rolluprows."building_city" AS "building_city",
    rolluprows."building_state" AS "building_state",
    rolluprows."total_floors" AS "total_floors",
    rolluprows."assignable_area" AS "assignable_area",
    totalrooms."total_rooms" AS "total_rooms",
    totalorganizations."total_organizations" AS "total_organizations",
    buildingdetails."ownership_type" AS "ownership_type",
    CASE
      WHEN NOT rolluprows."building_name" IS NULL
      THEN RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY rolluprows."campus_sector" ORDER BY rolluprows."assignable_area" DESC) - 1
      ELSE NULL
    END AS "adjusted_sector_rank"
  FROM "rolluprows" AS "rr"
  LEFT JOIN "totalrooms" AS "tr"
    ON rolluprows."building_name" = totalrooms."building_name"
  LEFT JOIN "totalorganizations" AS "toz"
    ON rolluprows."building_name" = totalorganizations."building_name"
  LEFT JOIN "buildingdetails" AS "bd"
    ON rolluprows."building_name" = buildingdetails."building_name"
  WHERE
    NOT rolluprows."campus_sector" IS NULL
), "grandtotal" AS (
  SELECT
    NULL AS "campus_sector",
    NULL AS "building_name",
    NULL AS "building_city",
    NULL AS "building_state",
    SUM("rankedrows"."total_floors") AS "total_floors",
    SUM("rankedrows"."assignable_area") AS "assignable_area",
    NULL AS "total_rooms",
    NULL AS "total_organizations",
    NULL AS "ownership_type",
    1 AS "adjusted_sector_rank"
  FROM "rankedrows" AS "rankedrows"
)
SELECT
  "rankedrows"."campus_sector" AS "campus_sector",
  "rankedrows"."building_name" AS "building_name",
  "rankedrows"."building_city" AS "building_city",
  "rankedrows"."building_state" AS "building_state",
  "rankedrows"."total_floors" AS "total_floors",
  CAST("rankedrows"."assignable_area" AS TEXT) AS "assignable_area",
  "rankedrows"."total_rooms" AS "total_rooms",
  "rankedrows"."total_organizations" AS "total_organizations",
  "rankedrows"."ownership_type" AS "ownership_type",
  "rankedrows"."adjusted_sector_rank" AS "adjusted_sector_rank"
FROM "rankedrows" AS "rankedrows"
UNION ALL
SELECT
  "grandtotal"."campus_sector" AS "campus_sector",
  "grandtotal"."building_name" AS "building_name",
  NULL AS "building_city",
  NULL AS "building_state",
  "grandtotal"."total_floors" AS "total_floors",
  CAST("grandtotal"."assignable_area" AS TEXT) AS "assignable_area",
  NULL AS "total_rooms",
  NULL AS "total_organizations",
  "grandtotal"."ownership_type" AS "ownership_type",
  "grandtotal"."adjusted_sector_rank" AS "adjusted_sector_rank"
FROM "grandtotal" AS "grandtotal"
ORDER BY
  "campus_sector",
  "adjusted_sector_rank",
  "building_name"

question: For each department, list the name of the department, the title of the TIP material associated with the department, author, ISBN, and whether it is available in the library reserves ('Available in Library' if yes and 'Not Available in Library' otherwise), the total number of materials available in the library for the department, and the total number of available materials across all departments.
sql:
WITH TIPMaterials AS (
    SELECT
        tm.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY,
        tm.TITLE AS TIP_Title,
        tm.AUTHOR AS TIP_Author,
        tm.ISBN AS TIP_ISBN,
        tso.OFFER_DEPT_NAME AS Department
    FROM
        TIP_MATERIAL tm
    JOIN
        TIP_DETAIL td ON tm.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY = td.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY
    JOIN
        TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED tso ON td.TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY = tso.TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY
),
LibraryReserves AS (
    SELECT
        lrc.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY,
        lrc.CATALOG_TITLE AS Library_Title,
        lrc.CATALOG_AUTHOR_NAME AS Library_Author,
        lrc.CATALOG_ISBN AS Library_ISBN,
        lrmd.LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY,
        lrmd.TERM_CODE,
        lso.OFFER_DEPT_NAME AS Department
    FROM
        LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG lrc
    JOIN
        LIBRARY_RESERVE_MATRL_DETAIL lrmd ON lrc.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY = lrmd.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY
    JOIN
        LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED lso ON lrmd.LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY = lso.LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY
),
CombinedData AS (
    SELECT
        tm.TIP_Title,
        tm.TIP_Author,
        tm.TIP_ISBN,
        tm.Department AS TIP_Department,
        lr.Library_Title,
        lr.Library_Author,
        lr.Library_ISBN,
        lr.Department AS Library_Department,
        CASE 
            WHEN lr.Library_ISBN IS NOT NULL THEN 'Available in Library'
            ELSE 'Not Available in Library'
        END AS Availability_Status
    FROM
        TIPMaterials tm
    LEFT JOIN
        LibraryReserves lr ON tm.TIP_ISBN = lr.Library_ISBN
)
SELECT
    TIP_Department,
    TIP_Title,
    TIP_Author,
    TIP_ISBN,
    Availability_Status,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN Availability_Status = 'Available in Library' THEN 1 END) OVER (PARTITION BY TIP_Department) AS Available_Materials_Per_Dept,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN Availability_Status = 'Available in Library' THEN 1 END) OVER () AS Total_Available_Materials
FROM
    CombinedData
ORDER BY
    TIP_Department, TIP_Title;
qualified:
WITH "tipmaterials" AS (
  SELECT
    tip_material."tip_material_key" AS "tip_material_key",
    tip_material."title" AS "tip_title",
    tip_material."author" AS "tip_author",
    tip_material."isbn" AS "tip_isbn",
    tip_subject_offered."offer_dept_name" AS "department"

  JOIN "tip_detail" AS "td"
    ON tip_material."tip_material_key" = tip_detail."tip_material_key"
  JOIN "tip_subject_offered" AS "tso"
    ON tip_detail."tip_subject_offered_key" = tip_subject_offered."tip_subject_offered_key"
), "libraryreserves" AS (
  SELECT
    library_reserve_catalog."library_reserve_catalog_key" AS "library_reserve_catalog_key",
    library_reserve_catalog."catalog_title" AS "library_title",
    library_reserve_catalog."catalog_author_name" AS "library_author",
    library_reserve_catalog."catalog_isbn" AS "library_isbn",
    library_reserve_matrl_detail."library_material_status_key" AS "library_material_status_key",
    library_reserve_matrl_detail."term_code" AS "term_code",
    library_subject_offered."offer_dept_name" AS "department"
  FROM "library_reserve_catalog" AS "lrc"
  JOIN "library_reserve_matrl_detail" AS "lrmd"
    ON library_reserve_catalog."library_reserve_catalog_key" = library_reserve_matrl_detail."library_reserve_catalog_key"
  JOIN "library_subject_offered" AS "lso"
    ON library_reserve_matrl_detail."library_subject_offered_key" = library_subject_offered."library_subject_offered_key"
), "combineddata" AS (
  SELECT
    tip_material."tip_title" AS "tip_title",
    tip_material."tip_author" AS "tip_author",
    tip_material."tip_isbn" AS "tip_isbn",
    tip_material."department" AS "tip_department",
    libraryreserves."library_title" AS "library_title",
    libraryreserves."library_author" AS "library_author",
    libraryreserves."library_isbn" AS "library_isbn",
    libraryreserves."department" AS "library_department",
    CASE
      WHEN NOT libraryreserves."library_isbn" IS NULL
      THEN 'Available in Library'
      ELSE 'Not Available in Library'
    END AS "availability_status"
  FROM "tipmaterials" AS "tm"
  LEFT JOIN "libraryreserves" AS "lr"
    ON tip_material."tip_isbn" = libraryreserves."library_isbn"
)
SELECT
  "combineddata"."tip_department" AS "tip_department",
  "combineddata"."tip_title" AS "tip_title",
  "combineddata"."tip_author" AS "tip_author",
  "combineddata"."tip_isbn" AS "tip_isbn",
  "combineddata"."availability_status" AS "availability_status",
  COUNT(
    CASE WHEN "combineddata"."availability_status" = 'Available in Library' THEN 1 END
  ) OVER (PARTITION BY "combineddata"."tip_department") AS "available_materials_per_dept",
  COUNT(
    CASE WHEN "combineddata"."availability_status" = 'Available in Library' THEN 1 END
  ) OVER () AS "total_available_materials"
FROM "combineddata" AS "combineddata"
ORDER BY
  "tip_department",
  "tip_title"

question: For each department and material status, list the name of the department, the material status, the number of TIP materials associated with this department and status, the number of library materials associated with this department and status, the total number of TIP and library materials associated with this department and status. Include a subtotal for each department and a grand total across all departments.
sql:
WITH TIPMaterialStatuses AS (
    SELECT
        tso.OFFER_DEPT_NAME AS Department,
        tms.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS AS Status,
        COUNT(td.TIP_MATERIAL_KEY) AS Total_TIP_Materials
    FROM
        TIP_DETAIL td
    JOIN
        TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED tso ON td.TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY = tso.TIP_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY
    JOIN
        TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS tms ON td.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY = tms.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY
    GROUP BY
        tso.OFFER_DEPT_NAME, tms.TIP_MATERIAL_STATUS
),
LibraryMaterialStatuses AS (
    SELECT
        lso.OFFER_DEPT_NAME AS Department,
        lms.LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS AS Status,
        COUNT(lrmd.LIBRARY_RESERVE_CATALOG_KEY) AS Total_Library_Materials
    FROM
        LIBRARY_RESERVE_MATRL_DETAIL lrmd
    JOIN
        LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED lso ON lrmd.LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY = lso.LIBRARY_SUBJECT_OFFERED_KEY
    JOIN
        LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS lms ON lrmd.LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY = lms.LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS_KEY
    GROUP BY
        lso.OFFER_DEPT_NAME, lms.LIBRARY_MATERIAL_STATUS
),
CombinedStatuses AS (
    SELECT
        COALESCE(tms.Department, lms.Department) AS Department,
        COALESCE(tms.Status, lms.Status) AS Status,
        COALESCE(tms.Total_TIP_Materials, 0) AS Total_TIP_Materials,
        COALESCE(lms.Total_Library_Materials, 0) AS Total_Library_Materials
    FROM
        TIPMaterialStatuses tms
    FULL OUTER JOIN
        LibraryMaterialStatuses lms ON tms.Department = lms.Department AND tms.Status = lms.Status
)
SELECT
    Department,
    Status,
    SUM(Total_TIP_Materials) AS Total_TIP_Materials,
    SUM(Total_Library_Materials) AS Total_Library_Materials,
    SUM(Total_TIP_Materials + Total_Library_Materials) AS Total_All_Materials
FROM
    CombinedStatuses
GROUP BY
    ROLLUP(Department, Status)
ORDER BY
    Department, Status;
qualified:
WITH "tipmaterialstatuses" AS (
  SELECT
    tip_subject_offered."offer_dept_name" AS "department",
    tip_material_status."tip_material_status" AS "status",
    COUNT(tip_detail."tip_material_key") AS "total_tip_materials"
  FROM "tip_detail" AS "td"
  JOIN "tip_subject_offered" AS "tso"
    ON tip_detail."tip_subject_offered_key" = tip_subject_offered."tip_subject_offered_key"
  JOIN "tip_material_status" AS "tms"
    ON tip_detail."tip_material_status_key" = tip_material_status."tip_material_status_key"
  GROUP BY
    tip_subject_offered."offer_dept_name",
    tip_material_status."tip_material_status"
), "librarymaterialstatuses" AS (
  SELECT
    library_subject_offered."offer_dept_name" AS "department",
    library_material_status."library_material_status" AS "status",
    COUNT(library_reserve_matrl_detail."library_reserve_catalog_key") AS "total_library_materials"
  FROM "library_reserve_matrl_detail" AS "lrmd"
  JOIN "library_subject_offered" AS "lso"
    ON library_reserve_matrl_detail."library_subject_offered_key" = library_subject_offered."library_subject_offered_key"
  JOIN "library_material_status" AS "lms"
    ON library_reserve_matrl_detail."library_material_status_key" = library_material_status."library_material_status_key"
  GROUP BY
    library_subject_offered."offer_dept_name",
    library_material_status."library_material_status"
), "combinedstatuses" AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(tip_material_status."department", library_material_status."department") AS "department",
    COALESCE(tip_material_status."status", library_material_status."status") AS "status",
    COALESCE(tip_material_status."total_tip_materials", 0) AS "total_tip_materials",
    COALESCE(library_material_status."total_library_materials", 0) AS "total_library_materials"
  FROM "tipmaterialstatuses" AS "tms"
  FULL OUTER JOIN "librarymaterialstatuses" AS "lms"
    ON tip_material_status."department" = library_material_status."department"
    AND tip_material_status."status" = library_material_status."status"
)
SELECT
  "combinedstatuses"."department" AS "department",
  "combinedstatuses"."status" AS "status",
  SUM("combinedstatuses"."total_tip_materials") AS "total_tip_materials",
  SUM("combinedstatuses"."total_library_materials") AS "total_library_materials",
  SUM(
    "combinedstatuses"."total_tip_materials" + "combinedstatuses"."total_library_materials"
  ) AS "total_all_materials"
FROM "combinedstatuses" AS "combinedstatuses"
GROUP BY
  ROLLUP (
    "combinedstatuses"."department",
    "combinedstatuses"."status"
  )
ORDER BY
  "department",
  "status"
